Storm Spool

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 301
resist shock [shockres]: +15
corpse lord [corpselord]: +2 #534 Corpse Construct construction
overcharged [stunattackers]: 1

Requires 5A to forge (A1)

An arcane device used to trap and store lightning. This device will increase the effectiveness of the Corpse Man Construction spell. When carried in combat anyone striking its wielder might get stunned by the energy of the storm spool.
